summary: Encapsulates the output of a sequence‑to‑sequence time‑series model’s decoder, storing the distributional loss, parameters of the chosen predictive distribution, and optional tensors such as cached attention keys/values, decoder and encoder hidden states, attention weights, and preprocessing scalers (loc, scale) together with static covariates.
business_intent: Facilitates training and inference of probabilistic forecasting models by providing all necessary decoder results—loss for optimization, distribution parameters for sampling, and auxiliary data for fast incremental decoding and post‑processing of forecasts.
